landing.title: Welcome to Tic Tac Toe
landing.subtitle: Choose a game mode to start playing

chooseSymbol.singleDesc: Will you play as X or O?
chooseSymbol.multiDesc: Player 1 will play as X or O. Player 2 will get the other symbol.

offline.message: You're offline. Some features may be limited.

installPrompt.title: Install App
installPrompt.description: Add this app to your device for quick and easy access, even offline.

pwaSettings.title: PWA Settings
pwaSettings.info: These settings allow you to manage the Progressive Web App features. Clearing cache will free up storage space but may affect offline functionality.

serviceWorkerUpdate.updateMessage: A new version of the app is available. Click to update and get the latest features!
